name: Levi's Garden
description:
A cute puzzle platformer where you take on the role of Levi, who is a fox gardener that is looking for more plants to add to his garden. Fight through beetles and jump over thorns to acquire rare plants and complete the game. This was the product of a weeks development, more development coming soon!

Programmer: Cameron Schiff https://805cameron.itch.io/

Art/Music/Level Design: Ryan Wojciechowski

Donate below to help out two college students
